languages.text: "Восславьте ток Движущей силы, воссияйте в ноосферных нимбах сладостным светом ея, напитайте аугментику свою живостью ея, омойте императивы и энграммы свои чистотой ея".
"Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."
languages.original_text: "Восславьте ток Движущей силы, воссияйте в ноосферных нимбах сладостным светом ея, напитайте аугментику свою живостью ея, омойте императивы и энграммы свои чистотой ея".

traits.locale_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “愿荣耀归于源力之流！愿它柔和的光芒照耀我们的通感之冠，愿它的活力滋养我们的植入物，愿它的纯洁洗刷我们的指令与程序。”
languages.original_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."

traits.locale_text: “愿荣耀归于原初动力之流！愿它柔和的光芒照耀我们的通感之冠，愿它的活力滋养我们的植入物，愿它的纯洁洗刷我们的指令与程序。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «¡Gloria a la corriente de la Fuerza Motriz! Que su luz armoniosa ilumine nuestras coronas noosféricas, que su vitalidad alimente nuestros aumentos, que su pureza inunde nuestros imperativos y engramas».
languages.original_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gloria a la corriente de la Fuerza Motriz! Que su luz armoniosa ilumine nuestras coronas noosféricas, que su vitalidad alimente nuestros aumentos, que su pureza inunde nuestros imperativos y engramas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「原動力の流れに栄光あれ！その鈍き光が、我らが人類圏の核心を照らし、その活力が我らの繁栄を養い、そのピュリティが我らの規則と記憶を洗い流すだろう」
languages.original_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."

traits.locale_text: 「原動力の流れに栄光あれ！その鈍き光が、我らが人類圏の核心を照らし、その活力が我らの繁栄を養い、そのピュリティが我らの規則と記憶を洗い流すだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei die Strömung der Antriebskraft! Möge ihr liebliches Licht in unseren noosphärischen Kronen leuchten. Möge ihre Vitalität unsere Augmentationen nähren. Möge ihre Reinheit unsere Befehle und Engramme fortspülen."
languages.original_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei die Strömung der Antriebskraft! Möge ihr liebliches Licht in unseren noosphärischen Kronen leuchten. Möge ihre Vitalität unsere Augmentationen nähren. Möge ihre Reinheit unsere Befehle und Engramme fortspülen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Gloire au courant de la Force Motrice ! Que sa lumière éclaire nos couronnes noosphériques, que sa vitalité nourrisse nos augmentations, que sa pureté lave nos impératifs et nos engrammes. »
languages.original_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."

traits.locale_text: « Gloire au courant de la Force Motrice ! Que sa lumière éclaire nos couronnes noosphèriques, que sa vitalité nourrisse nos augmentations, que sa pureté lave nos impératifs et nos engrammes. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Devinim Gücü'nün akışına şükürler olsun! Onun o ahenkli ışığı noosferik aylalarımızı ışıldatsın, diriliği ogmentasyonlarımızı beslesin, saflığı iradelerimizi ve belleklerimizi yıkayıp temizlesin."
languages.original_text: "Glory be to the current of the Motive Force! May its dulcet light shine in our Noospheric coronas, may its vitality nourish our augments, may its purity wash over our imperatives and engrams."
